title: Distress
effect:
3x Distress ➜ Panic.
4x Distress ➜ Hopeless.
──
Rest or indulge in your vice to discard.

title: Unconscious
effect:
4x Injury: You are helpless. You cannot take actions until someone revives you.
──
Get rid of your Injuries to discard.

title: Panicked
effect:
3x Distress: You can only play the top card of your Outcome deck.
──
Get rid of your Distress to discard.

title: Hopeless
effect:
4x Distress: You can only flee or give up.
──
Get rid of your Distress to discard.

title: Stuck
effect:
You cannot move.
──
Free yourself to discard.

title: Hindered
effect: You can only move or take actions, but not both, until you free yourself.

title: Boost
effect: Your next action or defense has +1 Effect or +1 Move.

title: Complication
effect:
A Complication makes your life harder.
──
Next action or defense has -1 Effect, then discard.

title: Freezing
effect: Every turn you end with 2x Freezing or more, you receive a Distress.

title: Burning
effect: Every turn you end with 2x Burning or more, you receive an Injury.

title: Doom
effect:
You are loosing your humanity.
──
3x Doom: You transform into a monster.

title: Salvation
effect:
You are regaining your humanity.
──
3x Salvation: You transform back into a hero.
